segments.text: The kitchen seems so ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that faucet is running full blast into the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling everywhere, ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just polishing that plate, ignoring it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron is getting wet from the splash, and she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are up to no good with the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is being reckless, stretching too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is egging him on, reaching up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery now; someone could fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate how careless everyone is being here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a tidy garden, mocking the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
